Clear.Label: clear
Clear.Description: A clear day. No penalties or modifiers.

Fog.Label: fog
Fog.Description: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.

Rain.Label: rain
Rain.Description: Rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

DryThunderstorm.Label: dry thunderstorm
DryThunderstorm.Description: Dry thunderstorms are dangerous because the lightning can start fires and there is no rain to put them out.

RainyThunderstorm.Label: rainy thunderstorm
RainyThunderstorm.Description: The lightning will start fires, but the rain will put it out. The rain also reduces movement speed and shooting accuracy.

SnowHard.Label: hard snow
SnowHard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

SnowGentle.Label: gentle snow
SnowGentle.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

BloodRain.Label: blood rain
BloodRain.Description: Anyone exposed to the blood rain for long enough will be driven into a berserk rage. Certain traits and psychic sensitivity influence the berserk effect. Anomaly

ToxRain.Label: tox rain
ToxRain.Description: Tox rain makes creatures sick with toxic buildup. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. Odyssey

Sandstorm.Label: sandstorm
Sandstorm.Description: Sandstorms reduce the accuracy of ranged weapons, slow people down, and get sand everywhere. Odyssey

BlindFog.Label: blind fog
BlindFog.Description: A heavy fog that reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, as well as their maximum range. Odyssey

Overcast.Label: overcast
Overcast.Description: Thick clouds obscure the sky, reducing light levels. Odyssey

Blizzard.Label: blizzard
Blizzard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. Odyssey

TorrentialRain.Label: torrential rain
TorrentialRain.Description: Torrential rain causes flooding. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down. Odyssey

VPE_Hurricane.Label: hurricane
VPE_Hurricane.Description: Extreme wind will cause a slowdown to everyone not under the roof. Vanilla Psycasts Expanded

Windy.Label: windy
Windy.Description: A clear, windy day, great for turbines, not so great for shooting. Seasonal Weather (Continued)

Cloudy.Label: cloudy
Cloudy.Description: A cloudy day, lowers brightness. Seasonal Weather (Continued)

FogSnow.Label: fog snow
FogSnow.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down, fog reduces sight. Seasonal Weather (Continued)

Dust.Label: dust
Dust.Description: Dust reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons. Seasonal Weather (Continued)

DryDuststorm.Label: dry duststorm
DryDuststorm.Description: Dry duststorms are dangerous because the lightning can start fires and there is no rain to put them out. Seasonal Weather (Continued)

DoubleRainbow.Label: double rainbow
DoubleRainbow.Description: A double rainbow. The weather is soothing. Seasonal Weather (Continued)

VPE_RadioactiveFog.Label: radioactive fog
VPE_RadioactiveFog.Description: A Nuclear reactor's meltdown has freed a cloud of radioactive material. This fog will hinder ranged attacks until it dissipates. Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power

SnowyThunderStorm.Label: thundersnow
SnowyThunderStorm.Description: A rare winter phenomenon where heavy snow falls with lightning and thunder. The snow reduces visibility and movement while lightning poses fire risks. (CAP) Thunder Snow
